remarks: Part of Lemma F in [Crawley] p. 116.  TODO: should this or part of it become a stand-alone theorem?  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2013.)
statement:
cdlemf1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemf1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.

cdlemf1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemf1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> E. q e. A ( P =/= q /\ -. q .<_ W /\ U .<_ ( P .\/ q ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ q $.
$d A q $.
$d H q $.
$d K q $.
$d P q $.
$d U q $.
